title: Japan’s Higher Rates Puts Bitcoin in the Crosshairs of a Yen Carry Unwind
contentSnippet: A stronger yen typically coincides with de-risking across macro portfolios, and that dynamic could tighten liquidity conditions that recently helped bitcoin rebound from November’s lows.

title: MetaMask moves into prediction markets with Polymarket integration
contentSnippet: Founded in 2020, Polymarket is now reportedly courting a valuation of up to $15 billion amid a breakout year.

title: Small Texas Lender Monet Joining Field of Crypto-Focused Banks
contentSnippet: The bank is owned by billionaire Andy Beal, a major supporter of U.S. President Donald Trump's 2016 campaign.

title: New 'Postal' Game Canceled One Day After Reveal, Following Generative AI Allegations
contentSnippet: Postal: Bullet Paradise has been scrapped and the developer is shutting down after gamers claimed the trailer used generative AI assets.

title: Meta cuts to metaverse ‘black hole’ could free up billions for AI and lift shares by 20%: analysts
contentSnippet: The lack of user traction, combined with years of mounting spend, has fueled concerns that the division, Mizuho analysts said.

title: Cantor Slashes Strategy Price Target By 59%, Remains 'Long-Term Bullish' on Bitcoin Giant
contentSnippet: Cantor Fitzgerald analysts significantly lowered their price target for Strategy (MSTR) shares, while reiterating an “Overweight” rating.

title: The Daily: JPMorgan says Strategy is key to bitcoin’s next move, IMF warns stablecoins may weaken central bank control, and more
contentSnippet: The following article is adapted from The Block’s newsletter, The Daily, which comes out on weekday afternoons.

title: Bitcoin, Ethereum and XRP Dive as Liquidations Hit $500 Million—While Stocks Rise
contentSnippet: Bitcoin is back below the $90,000 mark as Ethereum flirts with another dip below $3,000—all while major stock indices stay green.

title: New IMF Report Warns of Stablecoin Risk, Sparking Criticism From Experts
contentSnippet: The IMF released a report that campaigns in favor of CBDCs and warns against the risk stablecoins represent, sparking criticism among crypto experts.

title: Trump’s Security Strategy: Impact on Bitcoin, Gold, Bond Yields
contentSnippet: The White House's new National Security Strategy emphasizes increased global fiscal expansion and military spending.

title: Hedera Drops Alongside Broader Crypto Market Amid Volume Spike
contentSnippet: Hedera's token retreats despite fresh institutional product speculation driving broader altcoin momentum.

title: U.S. Prosecutors Seek 12-Year Sentence for Terraform Founder Do Kwon in Crypto Fraud Case
contentSnippet: The collapse of Do Kwon's Terraform project caused losses that surpassed those by Sam Bankman-Fried's FTX, Celsius and OneCoin combined, the prosecutors argued.

title: WisdomTree first to market with Ethereum staking fund using Lido’s stETH
contentSnippet: WisdomTree introduced an Ethereum-based fund in Europe that earns staking rewards using the decentralized Lido protocol.

title: Strive urges MSCI to ‘let the market decide’ on Bitcoin treasury companies
contentSnippet: Strive said the proposal could lead to uneven results worldwide because companies report Bitcoin differently under various accounting rules.

title: Indiana Lawmaker Pushes for Bitcoin in Pensions, Crypto Payment Protections
contentSnippet: A lawmaker in Indiana introduced legislation that would broaden access to Bitcoin and crypto exposure for savers in the Midwestern state.

title: US prosecutors push for 12-year prison sentence for Terraform co-founder Do Kwon’s role in $40 billion collapse
contentSnippet: U.S. prosecutors say Do Kwon should get 12 years in prison for his role in the remarkable $40 billion dollar collapse of Terra.

title: Trump DOJ Wants Terra Founder Do Kwon Behind Bars for 12 Years, Citing SBF Sentence
contentSnippet: Federal prosecutors reserved the right to pursue up to 12 years for Terra founder Do Kwon in an August plea deal. Now, they’re seeking that maximum.

title: Maryland Man Sentenced for Helping North Korea Infiltrate US Tech Firms
contentSnippet: The scheme enabled overseas DPRK operatives to access sensitive government systems through fraudulent IT jobs.

title: 2-4% Crypto Dip! Sovereign Wealth Funds Buying BTC! CTFC approves U.S. Spot Crypto!
contentSnippet: Crypto majors were broadly lower, falling 2–4% with BTC down 2% at $91,400, ETH down 2% at $3,130, BNB down 2% at $893, and SOL down 4% at $136, while ZEC (+4%) and TRX (+2%) led the day’s top movers.

title: Turkey's Paribu Buys CoinMENA in $240M Deal, Expanding Into High-Growth Crypto Markets
contentSnippet: With the acquisition, Paribu gains regulatory foothold in Bahrain and Dubai and access to the region's fast-growing crypto user base.

title: MARA Trades at a Premium Factoring in Its Debt, Not a Discount: VanEck’s Sigel
contentSnippet: VanEck’s Matthew Sigel argues MARA’s valuation looks expensive when adjusted for its leverage and capital structure.

title: Has the DAT Bubble Already Burst? CoinShares Says In Many Ways, Yes.
contentSnippet: Digital-asset treasury plays that once traded at big premiums have fallen back toward net asset value.

title: The Dollar Is Crumbling. Fiat-Backed Stablecoins Are Next
contentSnippet: One possible solution is a new kind of stablecoin whose value is pegged to a real-world, physical stockpile of gold, argues Algoz’ Stephen Wundke.

title: Beeple Made Robot Dogs With Musk, Zuckerberg, and Warhol Heads That Poop NFTs
contentSnippet: The installation at Art Basel is framed as a critique of algorithmic control, merging machine perception with on-chain “memories.”

title: XRP ETFs near $1 Billion, Sovereign wealth funds buying Bitcoin, CFTC approves U.S spot crypto trading - Daily Crypto Recap
Turkey’s Paribu to buy CoinMENA in deal worth up to $240 million, adding Dubai and Bahrain licenses
contentSnippet: Paribu has acquired CoinMENA in a transaction valued at up to $240M, expanding the platform’s regulated footprint into Dubai and Bahrain.

title: ‘I’m not betting on a markup this month’: Lawyer outlines three issues still holding up the crypto market structure bill
contentSnippet: Senate negotiators are struggling to finalize a bill as disputes over stablecoin yield, conflicts of interest, and DeFi slow progress.

title: Morning Minute: The CFTC Just Approved US Spot Crypto Trading
contentSnippet: Spot crypto trading is now cleared to go live with any CFTC-registered exchange, bringing down another barrier to institutional adoption.

title: Crypto sleuth ZachXBT claims British threat actor tied to $243 million Genesis creditor theft ‘likely arrested’
contentSnippet: A British hacker tied to the $243 million Genesis creditor theft has possibly been arrested in Dubai, according to onchain sleuth ZachXBT.

title: International operation busts crypto fraud network that laundered more than $815 million
contentSnippet: Coordinated raids led to arrests, multimillion-dollar seizures, and the disruption of key infrastructure, according to Europol.

title: Animoca eyes stablecoins, AI, DePIN as it expands focus in 2026: Exec
contentSnippet: Animoca Brands’ Keyvan Peymani says the Web3 gaming company is exploring all segments of the crypto industry, including DePIN, DeFi and AI.

title: Conor McGregor calls out Khabib over NFTs, gets shut down by ZachXBT
contentSnippet: The former UFC champion tried to launch his own celebrity memecoin, REAL, in April, but the project failed to gain traction.

title: Memecoin market sinks to 2025 low as $5B wiped out in a day
contentSnippet: Both memecoins and NFTs have plunged to their weakest levels since early 2025, with traders pulling back from speculative assets across the board.

title: NFT and memecoin markets recover after month-long crypto slump
contentSnippet: NFTs posted selective gains led by blue chips, while memecoins rallied broadly across major names in a sentiment-driven rebound.

title: NFTs hit the brakes: Market cap tanks 46% in just 30 days
contentSnippet: CoinGecko data shows the NFT market value has nearly halved in a month, with even top collections like BAYC and CryptoPunks losing ground.

title: Valve’s Counter-Strike 2 update crashes $5.8B economy, revives NFT debate
contentSnippet: A major update to Counter-Strike 2’s item mechanics wiped nearly $2 billion from its $5.8 billion skin market, igniting debate over central control in gaming.

title: Coinbase splashes $25M to revive a podcast from the last bull run
contentSnippet: Coinbase has paid $25 million for an NFT that compels the once popular crypto podcast UpOnly to restart. Bull market vibes anyone?

title: OpenSea rejects pivot from NFTs, says it’s evolving to ‘trade everything’
contentSnippet: OpenSea CEO Devin Finzer says the platform isn’t abandoning NFTs but expanding into a universal onchain trading hub.

title: Swiss regulator GESPA takes aim at FIFA’s NFT platform in formal complaint
contentSnippet: Switzerland’s nationwide gambling authority said user rewards on the platform feature the element of chance, categorizing them as gambling.

title: Fear returns to the crypto market as $230B vanishes overnight
contentSnippet: Investor sentiment turned sharply bearish as crypto’s fear index plunged to 28, and $230 billion in value evaporated in a single day.
